\c[23]Ah I see, you want your blue to actually be green. Okay.

\c[23]Yes, the red... is now orange. Not red. That is definitely not

\c[23]The green... it's not green. That's more of an orange. I'm not

\c[23]Yes, I wanted to say something about that green. It's not green.

you at a party? I completely understand if that's the case.
\c[23]I mean, that being said, I just want to make sure that it's not
too close to the blue. You know, could get confusing.
\c[23]I see you've chosen yellow rather than green for your green
light. Yellow is a lovely colour, very bright, but the one
thing it's not is green. But you know what, I kind of like it
better this way. Yellow. Without the green.
\c[23]Great! So just go on to the other room!
